Sentencas: The electrical conduction mechanism of mixed conductive perovskite oxides, La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta, for cathode materials of solid oxide fuel cells has been investigated from electronic structural changes during oxygen vacancy formation.
Titulo: An X-ray absorption spectroscopic study on mixed conductive La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ cathodes. I. Electrical conductivity and electronic structure

Sentencas: La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta was annealed under various oxygen partial pressures p(O-2)s at 1073 K and quenched.
Titulo: An X-ray absorption spectroscopic study on mixed conductive La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ cathodes. I. Electrical conductivity and electronic structure

Sentencas: Iodometric titration indicated that the oxygen nonstoichiometry of La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta depended on the annealing p(O-2), with more oxygen vacancies introduced at lower than at higher p(O-2)s. X-Ray absorption spectroscopic measurements were performed at the O K-, Co L-, Fe L-, Co K-, and Fe K-edges.
Titulo: An X-ray absorption spectroscopic study on mixed conductive La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ cathodes. I. Electrical conductivity and electronic structure

Sentencas: The valence states of the Co and Fe ions were investigated by the X-ray absorption near edge structure (XANES) at the Co and Fe L-III-edges.
Titulo: An X-ray absorption spectroscopic study on mixed conductive La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ cathodes. I. Electrical conductivity and electronic structure

Sentencas: While the Fe average valence was almost constant, the valence of the Co ions decreased with oxygen vacancy introduction.
Titulo: An X-ray absorption spectroscopic study on mixed conductive La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ cathodes. I. Electrical conductivity and electronic structure

Sentencas: The O K-edge XANES spectra indicated that electrons were injected into the Co 3d/O 2p hybridization state with oxygen vacancy introduction.
Titulo: An X-ray absorption spectroscopic study on mixed conductive La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ cathodes. I. Electrical conductivity and electronic structure

Sentencas: Both absorption edges at the Co and Fe K-edge XANES shifted towards lower energies with oxygen vacancy introduction.
Titulo: An X-ray absorption spectroscopic study on mixed conductive La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ cathodes. I. Electrical conductivity and electronic structure

Sentencas: The shift at the Co K-edge resulted from the decrease in the Co average valence and that at the Fe K-edge appeared to be caused by changes in the coordination environment around the Fe ions.
Titulo: An X-ray absorption spectroscopic study on mixed conductive La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ cathodes. I. Electrical conductivity and electronic structure

Sentencas: The total conductivity of La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta decreased with decreasing p(O-2), due to a decreasing hole concentration.
Titulo: An X-ray absorption spectroscopic study on mixed conductive La0.6Sr0.4Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ cathodes. I. Electrical conductivity and electronic structure
